text: Som Alternativa () is a political movement in Catalonia founded by former Podemos/Podem regional leader Albano Dante Fachin as a political platform in November 2017. It was registered as a party on 25 February 2019. The party contested the April 2019 Spanish general election within the Republican Front alliance with Poble Lliure and Pirates of Catalonia. ==References== Category:Political parties in Catalonia Category:Political parties established in 2017 Category:2017 establishments in Catalonia
title: Som Alternativa
